    BlendFactor :: enum i32 {
	Zero              = 0, 
	One               = 1, 
	Src               = 2, 
	OneMinusSrc       = 3, 
	SrcAlpha          = 4, 
	OneMinusSrcAlpha  = 5, 
	Dst               = 6, 
	OneMinusDst       = 7, 
	DstAlpha          = 8, 
	OneMinusDstAlpha  = 9,

	OneMinusConstant  = 12, 
}
